title: Current selection should reflect connection state in right panel.
author: GitCitizen
body_snippet:
Current selection under "Connections" should reflect connection state in right panel. 

mRemote automatically switches to the previously (and currently) logged in server screen but stays on the last server name under connections. This is very confusing and a security issue for me. 
The user should make their own choice to which server to select next, if any.

|Operating system | Windows 10 x64 |
|mRemoteNG version| 1.75.7012.16814|
